law.catch_line: An individual is a covered employee while performing a service for compensation in the course of the...
law.text:
An individual is a covered employee while performing a service for compensation in the course of the business, occupation, profession, or trade of an employer if, in relation to the service, the individual:
does not maintain a separate business;
neither represents to the public that the individual provides the service nor provides the service to the public; and
does not have a covered employee.
